name: Argon Assault (Siliconifier)
description:
You are a pilot on the planet Argon. You are the last line of defence against the invaders from Galactika. 

Navigate through the terrain using the WASD or arrow keys and fire with the Space bar. You can also connect a gamepad and move with the left analog stick and fire with the PS4's x Button.

Get the highest score. Happy hunting
